name: Bergbert: Der Racher
overview: You are Bergbert der Rächer (translates to Bergbert the Avenger). Wulfgar the Evil is about to conquer the World. Put on your superhero suit, charge your overkill emitter and make it to his lair. Defeat Wulfgar, so earth will be free and safe again." Instructions in particular: Kill everything that moves. Don't touch anything that moves. Despite the game's German name, the game itself is entirely in English.
